context_bundle.summary: Argo CD: Declarative GitOps continuous delivery for Kubernetes. Git repo = source of truth. Key features: Application CRD, sync policies (auto/manual), health checks, rollback, RBAC, SSO, ApplicationSet for multi-cluster, App of Apps pattern for hierarchy.

onboarding.quick_start: ArgoCD: 1) kubectl create ns argocd && kubectl apply -n argocd -f install.yaml, 2) argocd app create myapp --repo URL --path k8s/ --dest-server https://kubernetes.default.svc, 3) Enable auto-sync or manual sync via UI/CLI.
common_patterns: Application CRD: spec: { source: {repoURL, path, targetRevision}, destination: {server, namespace} }
Auto-sync: syncPolicy: { automated: { prune: true, selfHeal: true } }
App of Apps: Parent Application pointing to directory of Application manifests
ApplicationSet: Generate Applications from Git directories, clusters, or pull requests

known_errors.error: ComparisonError: failed to compare: unknown field
known_errors.cause: CRD schema mismatch between cluster and ArgoCD's known types
known_errors.solution: Update ArgoCD or add resource.customizations to ignore unknown fields
known_errors.prevention: Keep ArgoCD version aligned with cluster CRD versions
